tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
The best and most reliable dentist in Bangalore;

I met with Dr. Pujari to discuss my teeth alignment and shared my expectations with him. He listened patiently and offered suggestions to bring my expectations to fruition. In spite of the fact that I requested multiple appointments in response to my concerns, he enabled all appointments with patience and enabled treatment without a economic mindset. The alignment of my teeth has now been achieved through the assistance of Dr. Purjari.

 I recommend Dr Pujari for the following reasons;

Patience: It is an essential quality for doctors to be patient while listening to their patients' concerns in order to understand and address them.

The doctor cannot always be economical : in the event that things do not go as planned, the doctor should be able to extend the treatment without putting the patient at an undue financial burden.

Trust and assistance: It is the responsibility of doctors to establish trust and provide assistance to patients in times of difficulty

Happy ending: The patient should leave with a smile at the end of the treatment.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words...it really boosts us...plz do refer us to your friends and colleagues who need experienced hands in dental treatment ...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I went with tooth sharp radiating tooth pain on Sept 14 2020.  Dr. MR Pujari heard me patiently and after checking he prescribed root canal treatment. The tooth was filled once 6 years back. 

Total procedure took 4 visits (including fixing cap/crown). Dr. Srivatsa  said he goes slow to avoid any reinfection after RCT. 

-  First visit (approximately 15 mins, By Dr MR Pujari):  The tooth was 
drilled little bit and cleaned. Did not have pain after first session.   
-  Second visit (approx. 45 mins): Tooth preparation was done and cap measurement was taken by Dr Pujari. Half of the RCT was done by Dr. Srivatsa. Dr. Srivatsa was friendly and patient.  
-  Third visit (20 mins, Dr Srivatsa) : RCT was completed. 
-  4th visit (15 mins) : Cap fixing was done by some Lady doctor. 

Overall experience : Very good and painless RCT experience. 

Cons : Not as such. 

Note : Not sure if I can mention it here. Doctor could have advised not to take food till local anesthesia subsides. I bit my lips many times (As sensation was nill I did not realize I was biting myself :) ) as I started taking dinner just after 3rd visit. I realized it only after sometime.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback and kind words..wl do better..

I am satisfied with the whole process and would recommend this clinic to anyone. For someone like me with a very low pain threshold this place works really well. Doctors and very thoughtful and experts in their field.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was having throbbing pain in my lower first molar teeth. I got it extracted due to extreme pain. I am feeling completely no pain now. After extraction of tooth and surgery. Thank you so much for your time Doctor. It is only because of you I am able to speak now and survive life smoothly. Still recovering just got surgery done yesterday. I'm strictly abiding your prescription and measures. I hope to see good results also waiting for tooth replacement. As suggested by you to wait for 4 weeks to get it healed. I am for that moment. Kudos to your exertion. I highly recommend this Dentist.
Did a filling last week which came out in just 2 days. No water to clean and spit. Doctor was in a hur to attend multiple patients simultaneously.
reply_text:
Dear Patient,

It was temporary filling as ur tooth cavity was deep and root canal is the permanent solution as informed prior. Temporary filling takes only 2mins to fill. So no question of hurry. For permanent filling it takes 10min max.

review: Very smooth experience at the clinic. Timely follow ups and great experience. Doctors explained the issue well and gave right medicines.

By the blessings of almighty and skilled expertise of doctor, so far everything is good, no issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: visited doctor for halitosis, he explained clearly the root cause. need to remove 2 wisdom tooths and one old root canal decaying tooth. cleaning of the mouth. cleaning of the tar done today waiting for removal of wisdom tooth in next appointment. recommend doctor.

I went for root canal treatment by reading Practo reviews. But I got disappointed with the treatment, hygiene condition of the clinic. First of all Dr Pujari mostly doesn’t do RCT. There is always some junior doctors for that. That is the most surprising fact. Regarding RCT, mine was not done properly hence infection started after few months. They said it is human level error from their side. Cleanliness and hygiene condition is very poor. You have to remove shoes even when the support staff keep on roaming with dirty shoes. The passage or ladder to go up stairs is very dangerous. Not easy to climb for healthy or older people. I really suggest they close the Kundalahalli branch and open somewhere else with proper amenities and experienced doctors.
reply_text:
Dear Patient,

Ours is seventeen year old clinic. It is old but not unhygienic because even we breathe here. Our patients treatment is always a priority for us. I am a cosmetic dentist and a surgeon. I start and finish root canal with cap placement. In between one session is always done by root Canal specialist (not any junior doctor). If root canal fails, it is due to chronic infection,means if patient comes to us with late infection stage ,root canal cannot be guaranteed. At our clinic we do 100-150 root canals monthly out of which 5-10 can fail because poor prognosis of tooth. And it is same in all clinics of the world. Very sorry..we are also human beings with good experience to save your tooth but... NOT GODS

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited this clinic for RCT, where I found doctor is one but intern are more than 6, who are occupying the small space. For a single x-ray they (these interns) took 7,8 clicks at last one expert came who did it. After this one intern came and explained me about the crown, shape and size but the end product was different when I saw the crown . At last I fix that and few days back it fell down. This is because the crown was fixed by ***** ************* intern not by the doctor. In my case doctor only came to check what intern are saying correct or not. I am waiting for the lock down to be finish so that I can go to a good clinic where I can fix my crown and where I will be satisfied after paying money.
reply_text:
Dear Patient,

I guess you have visited a wrong branch of 32 Smiles. Interns are only at training centre at seegehalli branch.

 If you wish treatment from senior doctors, ask for main branch.

At this main branch only senior doctors like dr pujari , dr jaya and dr sarath operate. No room for mistakes here. 
Plz write your feedback on seegehalli branch only and not here.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I regret that I went to 32 Smiles for my ortho treatment. ** ****** ** *** ********** *** *** ***** ****** ** ***** ***** ******* He removed my two teeth by saying the gap will be filled by using the braces. At the start of the treatment he took 12K, after 6 months of visit (in every 20 days) ***** *** *** * ****** *********** ** ** ****** ** *** *** **** ******* I shifted to another city, he didn't returned my money and simply said sorry we can't help it now, you have to put bridge or go for implant of 2 teeths which he removed. ** ** ***** *** ** ***** * ******* ** ****** ***** ** ********* *** ****** *** ***** **** ** ********** I definately not recommend Dr Pujari's guidance for ortho treatment.
reply_text:
Dear Patient,

We always tell to wear retainer after completion of Orthodontic treatment (braces) which we give in package of treatment itself. If you don't wear obviously gap will come. We give retainer to patient and give all instructions also. If patient doesn't follow due their personal reasons then we cannot help on this. Your treatment was done by Dr. Mahantesh not by me. He told all this above to convey you

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
The Doctor was quite friendly, went for tooth filling and it just took 10 minutes for the overall process to get completed. The place was not as hygienic as you expect during these days. It definitely needs improvement as clinic gives you a feel of entering some kind of old age setup. More importantly I feel the charges for normal tooth filling were way too high which was not expected.

Overall the doctor was really friendly, no issues on that but the place definitely needs a makeover and the cost of treatment should be justified. It was significantly high...
reply_text:
Hi.. thanks for your feedback. We are 18yrs old setup clinic. So yes, clinic looks old but it is to the market standards. All sterlization protocols are followed. Most of our patients come to us on reference basis as we do painless treatments and efficient work. 

Treatment costs are based on present condition as vendors are charging us high due to covid-19 and China conflict. Dental materials are sold to us more than mrp and we are helpless.

But again , this cost is same or even more than us in other clinics.

review: Dr. Pujari and all other doctors and assistents were very friendly and explained the surgery procedures very well. Surgery was professional, neat and comfortable.

This was my second visit to the clinic. However, this time I was een by a different doctor. I booked the appointment for Dr. Pujari but was seen by someone else. The other doctor wasn't bad.  Just putting the truth here. I personally feel that I have more confidence in Dr. Pujari based on my previous visits.
reply_text: Hi... thanks for feedback... sometimes dr pujari will be doing surgeries on top floor, if any patients walks in our resident doctors would attend them..dr pujari always available when asked particularly for him..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
******** ********* ** *** *** ** ****** ** *** *** *** **** ** **** She got a lot of pain later on. He did root canal of wisdom tooth which is usually extracted. *** ***** ******* *** **** ***** ** *** *** **** ********** We came to gurgaon and got her checked again the new doctor *** ** ** *** *** ********* ***** *** **** **** ******* *** *** ******* ********** *** **** ** *** ****** 
Very bad experience ... . Will never recommend anyone.
reply_text:
Dear Patient,

It is wrong to put false allegations on doctor because of your own decision. We clearly gave you primary option of removing wisdom tooth as treatments are usually not successful for wisdom tooth. Since you were on blood thinners and you didn't wanted removal, so only option of pain relieving treatment was root canal. Obviously if there is more infection, it definitely fails as informed earlier.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. M. R. Pujari clearly understood my problem and was quick to provide a solution for the same. Scaling was done in a good way and he explained what effects it can have after the process. He also suggested a few treatments that would help me in keeping my teeth healthy. I'd recommend him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
1)First of all the place was very conjusted and not clean
2)same tools , suction pipe is used for patients without cleaning***** *** **** **** ** ************ ***********
3) instead of rushing on patients time slots can be provided to avoid the above mentioned issue and will have time to prepare for next patient

Apart from that treatment was good but only thing to be maintained is created heigenic environment
reply_text: Hi, being educated patient, You should not put false allegation. It's true that our clinic is small. But, we have two floors. Hygiene is important for both doctors and patients . Bacterias and virus don't discriminate. We always use new disposal suction. All sterilization protocols are strictly followed. And in this hard time of corona virus effect we are still treating your tooth pain without worrying about our lives. And you are putting false allegation after your job was done. Please note that more than 80% of dental clinics are closed. But , we are operating not for money but for the needy patients who had sleepless nights. Really disappointing having patient like you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: In such a big city it's very difficult to find a good doctor and very difficult to trust that doctor. But Dr.pujari, he is so friendly and he removed my husband's upper wisdom tooth so smoothly...it just took 5 min...no sutures...no tablets..nothing..doctor himself is so confident that we don't have to think about anything. Thank you so much doctor for treatment....

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is just fine and it's been 2 days since I had a discussion with the doctor. The problem is not solved yet and I just have to wait for a week to understand how my condition would be.  So I feel like I cannot give a feedback right at this moment.

Which clinic did u visit? 32 Smiles has 6 branches. Our clinics were closed during lockdown. Dr Pujari was not available during lockdown and none of our staff. I guess u visited a wrong clinic.
